participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is creative and energetic, often expressing herself through her choice of clothing and hobbies. She has a passion for music and gaming, which reflects her youthful and adventurous spirit.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Ava is socially conscious and loves engaging in discussions about current events. She's tech-savvy and enjoys staying connected with friends and the world around her through social media.
participant_2.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i am a feminist.
